subject: fix: prevent PWA update banner from reappearing on hard refresh
body:
- Move sessionStorage check before service worker registration so the SW
  still registers but the update banner is suppressed for that session
- Separate manifest icon purposes into distinct entries (any vs maskable)
  for better browser installability detection
- Add display_override to manifest for better display mode fallback
- Bump service worker cache version to v4
